definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: A large spy ring exists in this city.
sentences.chinese: 該市藏匿着一個龐大的間諜網。

sentences.english: The US has the largest and most sophiscated spy network in the world.
sentences.chinese: 美國有世界上最大最複雜的間諜網。
